history.proof: intros. unfold Coreflexive in *. intros Hxy2. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros A R2 R1 H x y Hxy.
intros A' R2 R1 H x y Hxy.
intros A' R2' R1 H x y Hxy.
intros A' R2' R1' H x y Hxy.

original: intros A R2 R1 H x y Hxy. unfold Coreflexive in *. intros Hxy2. apply H in Hxy2. apply H in Hxy. rewrite Hxy. rewrite Hxy2. reflexivity.
